channel.title: +1 Forward - Take an Advance... on Apocalypse World
channel.description:
It's a new kind of episode, where we help you "Take an Advance" on a particular PbtA game. We begin at the beginning - Apocalypse World. I'm very excited about this deep dive into a wonderful game.
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/take-an-advance-on-apocalypse-world
Rach and Rich bring on Madjay Brown of Diceology and Mark Diaz Truman of Magpie Games to talk about ways to get the best out of an *Apocalypse World* game. Join us for a deep dive into an RPG we all love.
Timecodes: 0:05:29 - Apocalypse World for players 0:05:51 - Our Favorite Playbooks 0:11:29 - Some Great Basic Moves 0:21:13 - Apocalypse World for the MCs 0:30:11 - Challenges to Consider 0:37:18 - War Stories (from games we've played)
You can find Madjay Brown's show here: https://www.diceology.com/ Madjay's Patreon is here: https://www.patreon.com/madjayzero
You can find Mark Diaz Truman's work here: https://magpiegames.com/
